DeleteSystemNoDeleteDP_hint: If you change System-Name, or delete a system please make sure to delete unused datapoints manually.
GetDataOnlyWhenDaylight: read and write data only at daylight
Interval to read data from PVSystem.org: Interval to read data from PVOutput.org
Interval to write data to PVSystem.org: Interval to write data to PVOutput.org
IsDonated_hint: If donated is checked then some more features are available Make sure to uncheck if donation period ends to avpid unnecessay error messages.
NetData Flag: The parameter when set to 1 will indicate that the power values passed are net export/import rather than gross generation/consumption.
OID where weather conditions are stored: Object-ID where weather conditions are stored in DasWetter
Upload_hint: Upload is optionally Description of flags you can find in readme or on API documentation
name: Name
